content: I just had a closer look at the validate operation an noticed that this should return 200 even if the validation results are containing errors. Hapi doesn't follow this logic, i think that's intentional? But shouldn't it be alligned with the FHIR spec?

Hmm yeah, I think this is a case of the spec changing from previous versions (i'm pretty sure it used to mandate a 422 on validation failure) and us not cathning up. We should definitely be returning 200 then (for R4+ only?)
